column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Amon says : " I received your invitation , young Avatar . "
#Text=Amon says : " Our showdown , while inevitable , is premature .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra !
#Text=Korra , are you all right ?
#Text=What happened ?
#Text=Was Amon here ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , he ambushed me .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Did he ... did he take your bending away ?
#Text=" Korra says : " No , I 'm okay .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Ah , thank goodness .
#Text=" Korra says : " I was so terrified , I felt so helpless .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It 's all right , the nightmare is over .
#Text=" Korra says : " You ... you were right ... I 've been scared this whole time .
#Text=I 've never felt like this before and ... and Tenzin , I do n't know what to do !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Admitting your fears is the first and most difficult step in overcoming them .

#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin Korra Mako Tarrlok Tenzin Antagonists Amon Equalists says : " Minor Aang ( flashback only ) Council page Fire Nation councilwoman Hiroshi Sato Ikki Jinora Lin Beifong Meelo Naga Pabu Pema Republic City reporters Sokka ( flashback only ) Toph ( flashback only ) United Republic Council Yakone ( flashback only ) " Shiro Shinobi says : " The Southern Water Tribe is under siege !
#Text=When Avatar Korra was attacked by a dark spirit , Chief Unalaq was the only one able to stop it .
#Text=So , Korra turned her back on Tenzin and chose Unalaq as her new spiritual mentor .
#Text=Tenzin and his family left for a vacation at the Southern Air Temple , while Korra remained in the Water Tribe .
#Text=Will she be able to restore balance between humans and spirits ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " You 're early .
#Text=" Korra says : " What can I say ?
#Text=I 'm pumped up to learn that Unalaq spirit fighting .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " I 'm not here to teach you to fight spirits , I 'm here to help you begin your spiritual training .
#Text=We 're going to one of the most remote places in the world , the long neglected spiritual center of your tribe , the South Pole .
#Text=" Korra says : " You 're going to train me at the South Pole ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " We will do more than just train .
#Text=By neglecting the spirits , the people of the South have brought darkness upon themselves , and now it threatens to destroy our tribe .
#Text=We must set things right .
#Text=The Southern Water Tribe depends on you .
#Text=" Korra says : " A dangerous trip to the South Pole ?
#Text=Count me in !
#Text="
